block.p: LAURUSKA-Victoria. On May 22, 1998. Devoted daughter of Albin and the late Felicia. Dear sister of John and loving niece of Nora Vessio. The family will be present on Tuesday from 2-5 and 7-9 PM, at F. Ruggiero & Sons, Inc., Funeral Home, 726 Morris Park Ave., Bronx. Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Wednesday, 10 AM, at St. Dominic's Church. Interment will follow at Buena Vista Cemetery, Brodheadsville, PA.
